page.title: 15HOME LIFE IN CLAYBROOKE
page.content: MY FAMILY by Louise Haddelsey I am 11yrs old. I have a sister called Celia who is 13yrs and goes to Lutterworth High School. I live at Claybrooke Rectory in Claybrooke Parva My father,Stephen, is a vicar and my mum, Katy, was once a nurse but is now training to be a secretary. We have lots of pets including pigs, goats, sheep, chickens,ducks and geese. MY FAMILY AND HOME by Sharon Mobbs I have 3 younger sisters at school and a baby brother. We live in the hamlet of Bittesby where there are only 6 houses. My Grandma lives in Bittesby too. My Father works on a farm and Mum stays at home to look after the family - she can not drive. Because we live a few miles from school we have to cacth the school-bus at 8.30am every morning .
